summary: The Whistleblower Protection Act of 2025 aims to extend whistleblower protections, as outlined in section 4712 of title 41 of the United States Code, to all contracts, subcontracts, grants, and personal services contracts funded by the Department of Housing and Urban Development. This applies regardless of when the agreement was made. The bill's purpose is to ensure that individuals are protected when reporting waste, fraud, and abuse related to HUD funding.
